item.title: regularization
item.description: References : To read: https://www.wikiwand.com/en/Regularization%5F(mathematics) https://www.wikiwand.com/en/Early%5Fstopping Questions : In machine learning and regularization is the process of adding information in order to solve an ill-posed problem or to prevent overfitting. Early Stopping Form of regularization used to avoid overfitting when training a learner with an iterative method, such as gradient descent. Such methods update the learner so as to make it better fit the training data with each iteration.
